channel.title: [ RS2 ] [ SRL ] Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker ! [ ~ ]
channel.description:
Hi Everyone,
I have finally updated my Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker into the SRL Include :D Please post Feedback and blaorts, I will be waiting... ;)
[b]If you see any bugs/suggestions/comments then post in this thread ofcourse... >.<[/b]
You know the rest... Oh and BTW, this is pretty small for a Script but it gets the job done! =D
EDIT: Make sure you start with the axe in the first inventory slot! EDIT: Added a Progress blaort as stated by a few people! =P EDIT: Fixed some bugs in the Script's Counters!
[b]EDIT 10/6/06 : Fixed the Major Bank-Finding Bug! Now works perfectly! =D[/b]
[b]EDIT #1 18/6/06 : Added some AntiRandom functions for less script detection![/b] [b]Re-Download! Downloads before update: 33[/b]
[b]EDIT #2 18/06/06 : Fixed Tree Finding! =D and another important update - Thanks to Pyro, Talking to Randoms works now! =)[/b] [b]RE-DL Once Again! Downloads before update: 5[/b]
[color=green][b]EDIT 20/06/06 : Fixed a Major Tree Finding Issue! =/ [b]RE-DL Again!! Downloads before update: 13[/b]
A Quick blaort:
[code] HowManyTrips = 3;
<============== -v1.01 by Surajd- Progress blaort ===============> Smashed: 111 Willow Log(s)! Banked: 3 Loads of Willows! Fixed: 0 Axe(s)! Found: 0 Ent(s)! Thanks for using the beefy Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker Script created by Surajd =D Successfully executed[/code]
[code]/~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\ | SRL Randoms blaort | | www.villavu.com/forums | |~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~| | Fight Random[s] : 1 | \~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~/[/code]
Worked perfectly and Banked the full 3 loads. Best report so far from MujaHed (SP) Smashed and Banked 700 Willows!
Cheers, Surajd ;)

item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

I agree with WhiteShadow, there is a procedure which finds colors head1, head2, head3 in SRL/Woodcutting.scar

its called function FindAxeHeadColor:boolean;

there was no need to make your own, but if you replaced A1, A2, A3 with head1, head2, head3 it would work just as well

Read full topic

I don’t think FindHead is ever going to work for you. Because it searches for axe using Head, Head2, Head3(FindAxeHeadColor).

item.title: [ RS2 ] [ SRL ] Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker ! [ ~ ]
item.dc:creator: @snu_woods snu woods
item.description:
@snu_woods wrote:

I keep getting this one error plz help:
Line 54: [Error] (54:1): Unknown Identifier ‘SRLRandomsReport’ in script…
Here’s the part of the script:
procedure ProgressReport;
begin
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’ + VersionNumber + ‘- Progress Report ===============>’);
WriteLn(’ Smashed: ’ + inttostr(STimes) + ’ Willow Log(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Banked: ’ + inttostr(BTimes) + ’ Loads of Willows! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Fixed: ’ + inttostr(FTimes) + ’ Axe(s)! ‘);
WriteLn(’ Found: ’ + inttostr(ETimes) + ’ Ent(s)! ‘);
SRLRandomsReport;
{Writeln(’ This Script has been running for: ’ + TimeRunning + ’ Minutes! ');} // Displays wrong time >.< (Not sure why?)
end;
end;

Read full topic

item.title: [ RS2 ] [ SRL ] Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker ! [ ~ ]
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

[quote=“roflcopterwhoosh, post:44, topic:3610”]Wow, very nice script! The only problem I had was that I was getting an error for the AntiRandoms.scar line 1374 whenever a strange box was found. The line 1374 in the AntiRandoms file reads: Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'New Box';

When I was looking at another SRL script there was the DeclarePlayers procedure, which seemed to declare the current player. So I added [code]Procedure DeclarePlayers;

var i: Integer;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=1; // Compliant with Dynamic Array;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Set the Players Array Length;

Players[0].Name :='myplayersname';
Players[0].Pass :='';
Players[0].Nick :='';

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do begin
    Players[i].Active := True;
end;

end;[/code]
Under VersionNumber = 'v1.01 by Surajd'; // Do not change!

and also added

DeclarePlayers; in your SetupScript procedure.

After I added that I no longer got the error and it instantly solved the two boxes that were in my inventory. Just thought you could change this to fit your script better and include it. :D[/quote]

You are very very correct without Declaring the Player Array as atleast 1 player SRL will give you runtime errors constantly. Thank you for pointing this out to everybody

[php]
–> Dankness
—> SRL Admin
[/php]

Read full topic
item.source: [ RS2 ] [ SRL ] Draynor Willow Smasher and Banker ! [ ~ ]
